Take it seriously. You have no right to be a cook. Deal with him."},{"lineNumber":251335,"originalJapaneseLine":"あわわわ・・やめて・・くれ・・とか言うがコックは連れていかれます。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, ah, please stop...\" they plead, but the cook is taken away."},{"lineNumber":251336,"originalJapaneseLine":"すみませんとマルチナが謝る","translatedEnglishLine":"Martina apologizes, saying, \"I'm sorry.\""},{"lineNumber":251337,"originalJapaneseLine":"総料理長、あんたの作る物はサイコーだ、あんたが真面目にやってくれている感謝している","translatedEnglishLine":"Head chef, what you make is the best. How about that?"},{"lineNumber":251348,"originalJapaneseLine":"食べきった方が勝ちな","translatedEnglishLine":"Whoever finishes eating first wins."},{"lineNumber":251349,"originalJapaneseLine":"ラッキー、俺達全員だぞ（謙信がいる場合は謙信ネタも）、それにあいつはすでに","translatedEnglishLine":"Lucky, it’s all of us (include Kenshin joke if Kenshin is present), and besides, that guy has already"},{"lineNumber":251350,"originalJapaneseLine":"あんなに食べた後だしな、アホだな。","translatedEnglishLine":"eaten that much before, he's an idiot."},{"lineNumber":251351,"originalJapaneseLine":"マルチナ、Ａ定食を３つ頼む。分かりました、３０分お待ちを","translatedEnglishLine":"Martina, order three A set meals. translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺はなんでも食う、残さない、少々味が悪くても問題ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I eat anything and leave nothing behind; even if the taste is a bit bad, it doesn't bother me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だがな、ちゃんと出来るのに手を抜かれるとむかつくたんだ、食材様に申し訳ないだろうが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But when someone slacks off even though they can do it properly, it pisses me off — it's disrespectful to the ingredients.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おいしく作れよ、真面目にやれよ、てめぇには料理人の資格はないな、処分しろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Make it delicious. Take it seriously. You have no right to be a cook. Deal with him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あわわわ・・やめて・・くれ・・とか言うがコックは連れていかれます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, ah, please stop..." they plead, but the cook is taken away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すみませんとマルチナが謝る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Martina apologizes, saying, "I'm sorry."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総料理長、あんたの作る物はサイコーだ、あんたが真面目にやってくれている感謝している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Head chef, what you make is the best. I appreciate your seriousness.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 教育も注意してやってくれているのは分かるさ、料理人のくせに料理に敬意を払わない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I know you're also teaching and correcting them, but there are fools who don’t respect cooking despite being cooks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バカがたまにいるのもしかたのない事だ、あんたのせいじゃねえ。気にするな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's inevitable that some idiots show up now and then, it's not your fault. Don't worry about it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ガルティアのイメージはサンプルです、なんか食い物に対してオトコマエにして下さい）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Galtia's image is a sample. Please make him look manly in relation to the food.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ところで、さっきからそこにいるお前ら侵入者か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, are you guys who’ve been standing there intruders?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスがいう、あいつが魔人ガルティアだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos says, "That guy is the demon Galtia."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが勝負を挑むと、食事中なのにやぼな事いうなよ、それより一緒に食おうぜ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Rance challenges him, he replies, "Don’t bring up boring stuff while I'm eating. Instead, let's eat together."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここまで乗り込んできたんだ、お前強そうだなと気に入られる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since you've come all this way, you seem strong, he takes a liking to you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでもランスが勝負しろと言うと、それなら大食い競争をしようぜ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Still, when Rance insists on a contest, he says, "Then let's have an eating contest."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺と　お前達全員でいいや。どうだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Me against all of you. How about that?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 食べきった方が勝ちな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whoever finishes eating first wins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラッキー、俺達全員だぞ（謙信がいる場合は謙信ネタも）、それにあいつはすでに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lucky, it’s all of us (include Kenshin joke if Kenshin is present), and besides, that guy has already

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんなに食べた後だしな、アホだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: eaten that much before, he's an idiot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マルチナ、Ａ定食を３つ頼む。分かりました、３０分お待ちを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Martina, order three A set meals. Understood, please wait 30 minutes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘画面に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > To battle screen

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はぁ・・はぁ・・なんとか食べたぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huff... huff... I've somehow eaten it all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティアを見ると、同じ量を一人で軽く完食していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking at Galtia, he had easily finished the same amount alone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お互い食べきったか、引き分けだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We both finished eating, so it's a draw.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、第２戦とするぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's start the second match.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マルチナ、今度はＡ定食を６セットだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Martina, this time six A set meals.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、わかりました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, understood.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘へ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > To battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大食い大会１，戦闘時の台詞、１ターン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Big eating contest 1, battle line, turn 1

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル「いただきます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Syl "Let's eat"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他、二人ほど食事を楽しみにしている感じで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Others, about two people, seem to be looking forward to the meal.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ４．５クリック　短め
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 4.5 clicks, brief.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大食い大会１，戦闘時の台詞、２ターン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Big eating contest 1, battle lines, turn 2

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなみ「これ、おいしい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kanami: "This is delicious."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他、二人ほど食事をおいしい、おいしいと食べている感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Others, two of them, are eating happily saying it's tasty.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ４．５クリック　短め
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 4.5 clicks, brief.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大食い大会１，戦闘時の台詞、３ターン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Big eating contest 1, battle lines, turn 3

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス「もぐもぐ・・うまいが多いな、ん・・」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance: "Munch munch... it's tasty but it's a lot, hmm…"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちらっと横を見る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He glances sideways.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティアはほとんど食べ終わっていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Galtia had almost finished eating.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （な、なんだと・・一人であんなに早く食うのか）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (W-what... he eats that fast all by himself?)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大食い大会２，戦闘時の台詞、１ターン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Big eating contest 2, battle lines, turn 1

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル「お、おかわりいっぱいですね、ランス様」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Syl: "Th-there are a lot of seconds, Lord Rance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス「いいから食え、来年の分まで食え、お前の食費がゼロで済むな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance: "Just eat it, eat enough for next year too. Your food expenses will come to zero."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ４．５クリック　短め
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 4.5 clicks, brief.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大食い大会２，戦闘時の台詞、２ターン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Big eating contest 2, battle lines, turn 2

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パン泥棒「こんだけあれば、ちょっとぐらい盗んでもね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bread thief: "With this much, stealing a little won't be noticed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵「こら、駄目だ、ちゃんと食べろ、反則だぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monster soldier: "Hey, no! Eat properly, that's cheating!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ４．５クリック　短め
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 4.5 clicks, brief.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大食い大会２，戦闘時の台詞、３ターン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Big eating contest 2, battle lines, turn 3

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 苦しい・・・と思いながら食べているランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance is eating while thinking it's painful...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こわごわとちらっと横を見る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He nervously glances sideways.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティアは平気でもくもくと食べいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Galtia is unbothered, eating steadily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: く、くそっ、負けてなるものかー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: D-damn it, I won’t lose—

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺はなんでも食う、残さない、少々味が悪くても問題ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I eat anything and leave nothing behind; even if the taste is a bit bad, it doesn't bother me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だがな、ちゃんと出来るのに手を抜かれるとむかつくたんだ、食材様に申し訳ないだろうが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But when someone slacks off even though they can do it properly, it pisses me off — it's disrespectful to the ingredients.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おいしく作れよ、真面目にやれよ、てめぇには料理人の資格はないな、処分しろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Make it delicious. Take it seriously. You have no right to be a cook. Deal with him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あわわわ・・やめて・・くれ・・とか言うがコックは連れていかれます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, ah, please stop..." they plead, but the cook is taken away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すみませんとマルチナが謝る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Martina apologizes, saying, "I'm sorry."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総料理長、あんたの作る物はサイコーだ、あんたが真面目にやってくれている感謝している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Head chef, what you make is the best. I appreciate your seriousness.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 教育も注意してやってくれているのは分かるさ、料理人のくせに料理に敬意を払わない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I know you're also teaching and correcting them, but there are fools who don’t respect cooking despite being cooks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バカがたまにいるのもしかたのない事だ、あんたのせいじゃねえ。気にするな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's inevitable that some idiots show up now and then, it's not your fault. Don't worry about it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ガルティアのイメージはサンプルです、なんか食い物に対してオトコマエにして下さい）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Galtia's image is a sample. Please make him look manly in relation to the food.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ところで、さっきからそこにいるお前ら侵入者か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, are you guys who’ve been standing there intruders?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスがいう、あいつが魔人ガルティアだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos says, "That guy is the demon Galtia."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが勝負を挑むと、食事中なのにやぼな事いうなよ、それより一緒に食おうぜ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Rance challenges him, he replies, "Don’t bring up boring stuff while I'm eating. Instead, let's eat together."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここまで乗り込んできたんだ、お前強そうだなと気に入られる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since you've come all this way, you seem strong, he takes a liking to you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでもランスが勝負しろと言うと、それなら大食い競争をしようぜ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Still, when Rance insists on a contest, he says, "Then let's have an eating contest."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺と　お前達全員でいいや。どうだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Me against all of you. How about that?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 食べきった方が勝ちな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whoever finishes eating first wins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラッキー、俺達全員だぞ（謙信がいる場合は謙信ネタも）、それにあいつはすでに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lucky, it’s all of us (include Kenshin joke if Kenshin is present), and besides, that guy has already

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんなに食べた後だしな、アホだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: eaten that much before, he's an idiot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マルチナ、Ａ定食を３つ頼む。分かりました、３０分お待ちを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Martina, order three A set meals. Understood, please wait 30 minutes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘画面に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > To battle screen

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はぁ・・はぁ・・なんとか食べたぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huff... huff... I've somehow eaten it all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティアを見ると、同じ量を一人で軽く完食していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking at Galtia, he had easily finished the same amount alone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お互い食べきったか、引き分けだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We both finished eating, so it's a draw.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、第２戦とするぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's start the second match.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マルチナ、今度はＡ定食を６セットだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Martina, this time six A set meals.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、わかりました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, understood.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘へ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > To battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大食い大会１，戦闘時の台詞、１ターン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Big eating contest 1, battle line, turn 1

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル「いただきます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Syl "Let's eat"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他、二人ほど食事を楽しみにしている感じで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Others, about two people, seem to be looking forward to the meal.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ４．５クリック　短め
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 4.5 clicks, brief.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大食い大会１，戦闘時の台詞、２ターン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Big eating contest 1, battle lines, turn 2

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなみ「これ、おいしい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kanami: "This is delicious."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他、二人ほど食事をおいしい、おいしいと食べている感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Others, two of them, are eating happily saying it's tasty.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ４．５クリック　短め
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 4.5 clicks, brief.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大食い大会１，戦闘時の台詞、３ターン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Big eating contest 1, battle lines, turn 3

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス「もぐもぐ・・うまいが多いな、ん・・」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance: "Munch munch... it's tasty but it's a lot, hmm…"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちらっと横を見る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He glances sideways.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティアはほとんど食べ終わっていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Galtia had almost finished eating.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （な、なんだと・・一人であんなに早く食うのか）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (W-what... he eats that fast all by himself?)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大食い大会２，戦闘時の台詞、１ターン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Big eating contest 2, battle lines, turn 1

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル「お、おかわりいっぱいですね、ランス様」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Syl: "Th-there are a lot of seconds, Lord Rance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス「いいから食え、来年の分まで食え、お前の食費がゼロで済むな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance: "Just eat it, eat enough for next year too. Your food expenses will come to zero."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ４．５クリック　短め
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 4.5 clicks, brief.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大食い大会２，戦闘時の台詞、２ターン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Big eating contest 2, battle lines, turn 2

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パン泥棒「こんだけあれば、ちょっとぐらい盗んでもね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bread thief: "With this much, stealing a little won't be noticed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵「こら、駄目だ、ちゃんと食べろ、反則だぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monster soldier: "Hey, no! Eat properly, that's cheating!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ４．５クリック　短め
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 4.5 clicks, brief.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大食い大会２，戦闘時の台詞、３ターン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Big eating contest 2, battle lines, turn 3

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 苦しい・・・と思いながら食べているランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance is eating while thinking it's painful...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こわごわとちらっと横を見る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He nervously glances sideways.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティアは平気でもくもくと食べいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Galtia is unbothered, eating steadily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: く、くそっ、負けてなるものかー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: D-damn it, I won’t lose—
